title: Journalism realizes it has a business talent problem
description: A few years ago, I was given some advice I resented: You need a business partner. Once I cooled off, I realized that counsel, which arrived in a LION sustainability audit, was wise if difficult to achieve. Try finding a grant for a business partner. Go ahead, I’ll wait. Not getting “operational” money is, of...
